channel.title: Help Me Plz SomeBody
channel.description: Ok When Ever I Add A Object And Make It Do Soming (e.g attack xp) it duss not work... i mean the object is there... but it duss not work... and yes i do put it in the right place (i think...) i add it above the you get attack xp thing.. any ideas???[br][size=1]Posted on: April 27, 2007, 12:37:44 PM[/size][hr]Plz Help.....[br][size=1]Posted on: April 27, 2007, 12:42:30 PM[/size][hr]Plz!!! I Begg U....

item.title: Help Me Plz SomeBody
item.dc:creator: @Gr4v1ty_Pk3r Gr4v1ty Pk3r
item.description:
@Gr4v1ty_Pk3r wrote:

Ok here , search for ,


case [red]823[/red]:		
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("You attack the dummy.");
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 12;
}
break;

Right the thing i put in red determines what the thing is giving exp.
So add ,


case (Object Id):		
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("( Message )");
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[0]), 0); ( Exp you wanna give ) [0] Is Skill
actionTimer = 12;
}
break;

Something like this to tele them ;

case 8972: // kalphite zone if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You teled to the Kalphite Zone , Carefull !"); teleportToX = 3487; teleportToY = 9493; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Thanks , Gr4v1ty Pk3r
